remarks: Function-builder for iterated derivative, division rule for constant divisor.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
dvnmptdivc.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) $.
dvnmptdivc.x $e |- ( ph -> X C_ S ) $.
dvnmptdivc.a $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> A e. CC ) $.
dvnmptdivc.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X /\ n e. ( 0 ... M ) ) -> B e. CC ) $.
dvnmptdivc.dvn $e |- ( ( ph /\ n e. ( 0 ... M ) ) -> ( ( S Dn ( x e. X |-> A ) ) ` n ) = ( x e. X |-> B ) ) $.
dvnmptdivc.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
dvnmptdivc.cne0 $e |- ( ph -> C =/= 0 ) $.
dvnmptdivc.8 $e |- ( ph -> M e. NN0 ) $.
dvnmptdivc $p |- ( ( ph /\ n e. ( 0 ... M ) ) -> ( ( S Dn ( x e. X |-> ( A / C ) ) ) ` n ) = ( x e. X |-> ( B / C ) ) ) $.
$d A n $.
$d C x $.
$d M n x $.
$d S n x $.
$d X n x $.
$d n ph x $.
